[Version 1.6.4] - 2025-02-20
============================

Added
-----

- Added a docstring for the `MysqlApplication` class to improve code documentation and clarity.

- Introduced an "About" section in `home.html` to provide users with brief information about the developer and the application.

Changed
-------

- Enhanced the documentation for better readability and maintainability.

- Improved the UI by adding the "About" section for a better user experience.
